data.title: Mammootty Mother Passed Away Due To Age Related Issues
data.meta_description: Mammootty Loses His Mother: Mammootty Mother Passed Away Due To Age Related Issues
data.text:
Malayalam Superstar Mammootty's mother Fatima Ismail breathed her last on April 21 at 93. She passed away after suffering from an age-related illness. Fatima Ismail, passed away at a private hospital in the wee hours of Friday. As per various reports, the burial will take place at 4:00 PM at the Chempu Juma Masjid Kabristan. She is survived by her children, including actor Ibrahim Kutty, Zakariah, Ameena, Sauda, and Shafina.

Mammootty is familiar to Telugu audience too. He is popular with many superhit Telugu films. His Swathi Kiranam and recently Yatra were directly made into Telugu and became successful. Ahead of the auspicious day of Eid, the demise of Mammootty's mother and Dulquer Salmaan's grandmother left their family in grief.

The entire Mollywood industry woke up to tragic news about the demise of Mammoottyâ€™s mother, Fatima Ismail. Following the demise, celebrities from the Malayalam industry as well as fans took to their social media to extend their heartfelt condolences and support for the family.

Mammootty is currently doing a key role in Akhil Akkineni 's Agent which is releasing on April 28th.
